scripts.build:time: echo 'Build started at %time%' && next build && echo 'Build completed at %time%'
scripts.ai:validate: pnpm ai:type-check && pnpm lint && pnpm format --check
scripts.ai:validate:full: pnpm type-check && pnpm lint && pnpm format --check
scripts.ai:commit: pnpm ai:validate && git add . && git commit
scripts.deploy:auto: git add . && git commit -m "Auto deployment" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:msg: echo 'Usage: npm run deploy:msg -- "Your commit message"' && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.supabase:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id jjpklpivpvywagmjjwpu > src/types/database.ts
scripts.supabase:link: echo 'Use: npx supabase link --project-ref jjpklpivpvywagmjjwpu -p YOUR_PASSWORD'
scripts.supabase:db-pull: echo 'Use: npx supabase db pull --project-ref jjpklpivpvywagmjjwpu -p YOUR_PASSWORD'
scripts.supabase:db-push: echo 'Use: npx supabase db push --project-ref jjpklpivpvywagmjjwpu -p YOUR_PASSWORD'
